Character

Class AttributeCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Utility.Entity
        • Character.Character
          • Character.AttributeCharacter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interactable, Moveable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyCharacter, PlayerCharacter

    public abstract class AttributeCharacter
extends Character
implements Moveable
    Abstract class that determines what makes a character possess attributes, such as speed. Holds information about the speed of this character.
    Version:
    2013-02-28
    Author:
    Alexander Persson & Jimmy Svensson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
